Function Summary
fun <T, K>
Stream<Iterable<T>>
groupBy(toKey: (T) -> K): Stream<Map<K, List<T>>>
Transforms the Stream<Iterable> by grouping the contents of each stream element into a Map>
using the given toKey function to calculate the key to use in the map for each value
